00016 module precision
00017 
00018 ! Real kinds
00019 
00020 integer, parameter :: kr4 = selected_real_kind(6,37)       ! single precision real
00021 integer, parameter :: kr8 = selected_real_kind(15,307)     ! double precision real
00022 
00023 ! Integer kinds
00024 
00025 integer, parameter :: ki4 = selected_int_kind(9)           ! single precision integer
00026 integer, parameter :: ki8 = selected_int_kind(18)          ! double precision integer
00027 
00028 !Complex kinds
00029 
00030 integer, parameter :: kc4 = kr4                            ! single precision complex
00031 integer, parameter :: kc8 = kr8                            ! double precision complex
00032 
00033 end module precision
